comments: After upgrading to 3.3 M1 and then to the latest Integration build eclipse-SDK-I20060830-1650-win32 I get an error while doing a organize imports. I have attached a snapshot of the error. JDK 1.5 being used.

Created an attachment (id=49258)
Error Dialog Snapshot

Please check the .log for entries and attach them here.

Is the problem reproducible?

This is reproducible al lthe time...I basically cannot do organize imports with the build.

It looks as if your update introduce some problems. How did you do the update?

You raise a good question..I overwrote the previous 3.2 directory. After I unzipped the new version in a seperate directory, it works fine and  does not throw the error. Not sure if this can be considered a bug anymore.
Never override an installation... :-) Closing the bug.
